events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case and will be contacting the customer shortly.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund, and I am here to help you with that process.
Could you please provide your order number and let me know if the product was opened or used in any way?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 123456789 and the item is unopened and unused. I just want a full refund.
We have processed your refund request. You will receive the amount back on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for your quick help. I appreciate the refund process and look forward to receiving the money soon.
The refund has been successfully initiated and the case is now considered resolved on our side.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received my refund yesterday. Everything was handled very professionally, thank you again!
The case has been formally closed following confirmation of refund receipt and positive customer feedback.
We have sent you a brief survey to gather your feedback about this support interaction. Your opinion matters greatly to us.
